peripheral.title: IWDG
peripheral.help_text:
The independent watchdog is used to detect and resolve malfunctions due to software failure.
It triggers a reset sequence when the counter reaches the timeout value.

peripheral.title: IWDG
peripheral.help_text:
The Independent watchdog peripheral detects and solves malfunctions due to software failure,
and triggers system reset when the counter reaches a given timeout value.

peripheral.help_text:
The independent watchdog is used to detect and resolve malfunctions
due to software failure. It triggers a reset sequence when the counter reaches the timeout value.

peripheral.title: IWDG
peripheral.help_text:
The independent watchdog (IWDG) peripheral offers a high safety level, thanks to its
capability to detect malfunctions due to software or hardware failures.
The IWDG is clocked by an independent clock, and stays active even if the main clock fails.
